name: Daphnis Labs
tagline: Your next door indie gaming studio
description:
We are a 2.5 years old nerdy, passionate mobile app and game development company. We have worked with about 40 startups and SMEs headquartered in India, Russia, Singapore, Australia, etc. We have built apps and games for various verticals and platforms.
We have taken care of startups from the stage of Idea generation to customer retention.

locations.address: 609, Pearls Best Heights - 2, Netaji Subhash Place
